title: Guimbal compatibility
content:
How is it possible to have such a bad compatibility with the guimbal leader OSMO???
Google pixel claim to be one of the best camera and filming tool of the market. And it could be true if there weren't those unbelievable nonsenses!
How not to develop partnerships to keep excellence? Not even a decent zoom. The only way I found is to buy a 20 euros app: pro take:-(
Act as a leader please!
